name: provideContext
signature: { <R>(context: Context<R>): <A, E>(self: Stream<A, E, R>) => Stream<A, E, never>; <A, E, R>(self: Stream<A, E, R>, context: Context<R>): Stream<A, E, never>; }
description:
Provides the stream with its required context, which eliminates its
dependency on `R`.
documentation:
Provides the stream with its required context, which eliminates its
dependency on `R`.
